description: This dashboard works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: Virtual and Resident memory size in bytes, averages over 5 min interval
panels.title: Average Memory Usage

panels.description: Average user and system CPU time spent in seconds.
panels.title: Average CPU Usage

panels.description:
In this kanban: the total disk, usage, available, and usage rate are consistent with the values of the Size, Used, Avail, and Use% columns of the df command, and the value of Use% will be rounded to one decimal place, which will be more accurate .

Note: The Use% algorithm in df is: (size-free) * 100 / (avail + (size-free)), the result is divisible by this value, non-divisible by this value is +1, and the unit of the result is %.
Refer to the df command source code:
panels.title: Disk Space Utilization
General Counters, CPU, Memory and File Descriptor Stats

targets.expr: pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"$datname", instance=~"$instance:9187", state=~"idle|idle in transaction|idle in transaction (aborted)"}

panels.description: Total amount of data written to temporary files by queries in this database. All temporary files are counted, regardless of why the temporary file was created, and regardless of the log_temp_files setting.
panels.title: Temp File (Bytes)

targets.legendFormat: write_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk.
sync_time - Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk.

title: PostgreSQL Database_edit
